phrases: Well, I will be going now, Ayumi.
Just because he is a bit handsome...
It is nothing that you need to apologize about.
But now, we have all of the student council back together again.
That is why I decided that I will stick it out with you,
until you have risen back up to normal.
I give you, Otosaka, this magic spell!
The magic spell of being all right!
The memorable Yusarin's magic spell series, 1!
The magic spell of being all right!
On the first day she appeared on Move-Asa, this infamous magic spell idea
I reserved your new single Hatsunetsu Days!
This cheerfulness that is even annoying...
I am so thankful of it.
I think I can spend everyday life like I had always done.
The music video that comes with the first press of my new single Hatsunetsu Days!
I will head over to the cafeteria ahead of you.
I have been waiting for you.
There is not much meaning to it.
I just wanted to eat this limited dish for the first time in a while.
He is obviously being considerate of me.
But for now, I will indulge in his friendliness.
I am happy I can eat this again.
It really is tasty after all.
No matter how many times you eat this, you do not get sick of eating it.
Let us hurry up and eat this.
That guy is going to show up again?
You guys are so slow... what were your zodiac signs again?
Well, now that everyone is here, I guess we will start by watching Kurobane's music video...
To be able to watch it before anyone else!
You have got one rabid fan here, so it is all right even if it is a horrible video.
A side glance indicates prone to illness
Faltering home and then all alone
Even if I am alone I can become strong
The days where I thought that are becoming more distant
And my voice does not reach
Come on, give her some kind of feedback.
Oh, I am going to dock points because you just called yourself Yusarin.
Within your mind, Tomori, around how many points do I have..?
10 points for the singing, 20 points for the song, 20 points for the costume, 30 points for editing.
And -51 points for the singer being so pathetic.
Can you reevaluate based on just the music video?
And now it is down to 19 points!
Yusa is totally looking dumb right now because of that!
Well, it is not like I am your fan or anything, so as a business, I believe it is a perfect 100.
That is pretty unusual for you.
- Yusarin is so happy! - For now, I would like to watch it again!
The next time is the last time!
In any case, he is late...
Then, why did you gather us?
Let us see... these are tickets for a ZHIEND gig.
Yusa, you did not know about them?
It is the rock band that Tomori loves.
Post-rock is a type of rock music.
It has rhythms, chords, melodies, and chord progressions that are not in traditional rock.
Now I understand it even less...
That does not matter at all.
Right here, I have two ticket for ZHIEND's gig.
The problem is, what should I do with them?
I am not comprehending the meaning of this...
She means, one person gets to go with her.
But I do not know about that something-rock...
Their reviews and popularity overseas are super-high, too...
If your song was a perfect score at 100 points, ZHIEND would score a million points.
To think there was a score above a perfect score!
So, do I have any volunteers?
I do not have much interest, either.
How about you go together with Tomori?
What is with deciding it by process of elimination?
I have not heard Misa's opinion yet!
I will go if I can listen to a super-fast two-bass at BPM260.
You will not get a super-fast two-bass at BPM260 so please refrain yourself.
So, that means it is been decided that Otosaka is going.
It is all right at a time like this?
Is not it good every so often?
You are going to let me eat Modern-yaki?
I am in Japan, why the hell is this!
Are not you talking about okonomiyaki with noodles in it?
If you do not mind it being Hiroshima-yaki, they have it at any normal okonomiyaki place.
Does it have noodles in it?
By all means, take me there.
I will have some oolong tea...
Oh, no, make that two Hiroshima-yakis, please!
Even if I go home, nobody is going to have dinner ready for me anymore...
I have to get used to this lifestyle soon...
You want to cook it yourselves?
Oh no, she is blind, so please cook it for us?
I am Sala Shane, the vocalist for ZHIEND!
I-I cannot believe Sala dropped by such a filthy little okonomiyaki place like this!
Oh, I will be going to the gig tomorrow!
A-And, can I get an autograph on a signboard?
I am surprised she can draw that without being able to see...
The pancake part is really thin!
Well, it is not a Modern-yaki, so there will be differences.
I am looking forward to your gig!
I am sorry I made you pay for that...
Did something bad happen to you recently?
I can tell from how you breathe and how your voice sounds.
You have been emitting despair nonstop.
Did you lose someone close to you or something?
You are amazing... that is exactly it.
If you do not mind, can you tell me about it?
Just the other day, I lost my little sister in an accident.
You have been this kind to me.
At least let me put up some smoke for that little sister.
By that, do you mean some incense?
No, no, you do not have to go that far...
No, I would like you to allow me to!
Hey... I have one favor to ask you.
There is someone I would like you to meet.
She has a sibling that loves your band.
Sounds like that person is not an ordinary fan.
Come to think, this is the first time I am calling her...
Oh, um... it is me, Otosaka.
I do not want you to be surprised by this.
But I am here together with the vocalist of ZHIEND right now.
There is no merit for you to tell a lie like that.
You can meet her, you know?
What would I do by meeting her?
You can talk to her, and actually I
Even if I could meet her, I would not go out of my way to meet her.
I love the music and performance of ZHIEND,
so I just want to listen to their CDs and watch their gigs.
That is all there is to it.
And is that all you called for?
I am going to hang up.
Oh no... that is not it!
You are beating around the bush... what is it?
Sorry to make you wait, they are not close by.
When do you have to be back by?
Time is not something to consider.
It is fine, you can take me anywhere.
At this point, what is important to you is already just as important to me.
But your gig is tomorrow... is it really all right?
The band members and our producer will make do somehow.
I have to tell her I do not need dinner...
There you go with another heavy sigh.
Did you just remind yourself of your little sister?
You really do see through everything.
That was lunch that we had.
What do you want to eat?
When you go on train rides of course it would
be a soba place that you eat standing up!
This menu item is way too amazing!
I got to pay my respect to whoever came up with this!
Hey, can I ask you one thing?
I am sorry this is a delicate question... but those eyes... are they completely blind?
The fact that you can write autographs means that you were not born blind, right?
But this is repentance for me.
I guess it is like atonement for my sins.
Have you ever thought about life?
Life is something you live only once, right?
I had dreamed of standing on stage as the front-man for a band.
But my life was already beyond hope before I knew it,
and I could not grant myself that dream.
I was pitiful at both singing and playing a guitar,
while on TV, people my age were showered with praise from their songs.
But, that is exactly what you are now.
I cheated just for my own greed, even.
There was a time when I was popular in Japan, too.
A social phenomenon, a person of the times, that kind of success.
How the people around you look at you change.
In the end, you end up troubling your family.
My little brother got kidnapped once for ransom.
So that is why I ended everything of that sort.
As a result, I decided I wanted to be the front-man for a really dull band.
Finally, I bartered my eyesight away, and that is the end.
Well, I am sure you do not quite understand it right now.
But, if such a day ever comes for you...
Make sure to handle it well.
I can see where we are headed to, but I need you to walk just a little more.
I am so sorry to drag you out to somewhere so far away.
You are a really kind person right now.
You were not like that in the past, were you?
I am not self-aware of it, but you are probably right...
I am sure you have met good people.
If that is the case, I cannot think of anyone other than Tomori.
You are beating around the bush... what is it?
I want your big brother to meet this person.
Your big brother has been a ZHIEND fan for a long time, right?
Something might happen as a result of him meeting the band's vocalist.
For instance... he might become sane again...
That is too good to be true.
But, I want to bet that it would!
But why do you care so much about my big brother?
Come to think, she is right.
I am more of a person that has knocked down others for my sake...
Well, how to put it... thank you very much.
Then, can you relay to the hospital that Sala and I are going to visit?
I do not know what condition he is in right now.
Please have your heart ready for this.
I can feel how heavy the situation is just from your voice.
The painkillers have worn off again!
This is a very strange feeling...
Hey, what is that person doing right now?
This is a lot heavier than I expected.
In the past, he looked up to your band,
and he was about to debut from a major record label as a guitarist.
Chasing for what is far ahead
Do not know why but the beauty
Kazuki Tomori, can you tell who I am?
Do you remember about your little sister Nao?
Seems like some sort of miracle just happened?
Your song was able to wake him up.
You seem happy from the bottom of your heart.
That makes me just as happy.
I guess you moved one step forward?
I am glad I was able to spend a very fruitful day today.
By the way, I am planning on going to your gig tomorrow.
Then I will sing while keeping in mind that you are out there in the audience.
And the person you care about will be there too, right?
Tomori, you were the one that changed me...
You want to hear what happened?
I am standing outside the hospital right now.
I received notice from the nurses, and rushed over.
It was the first time in a while that I saw my big brother like that...
Your decision was a wonderful one.
So, I wanted to give you my thanks.
So, I will see you again tomorrow.
You have not forgotten about the gig, have you?
Why does it feel so nostalgic?
